DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the relation between sulphide detoxification and butyrate metabolism at the level of gene expression and enzyme activity in ulcerative colitis patients and healthy controls.
DOC.brief_title: Hydrogen Sulfide Detoxification and Butyrate Metabolism in Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Ulcerative colitis patients: patients diagnosed with ulcerative colitis Healthy controls: no diagnosis of inflammatory bowel diseases Intake of antibiotics in the last month before the study
